changelog.changes: - Fix audio/video switching.

Moved the YTMusicUltimate button to the settings page (Click on the profile picture in the top right corner to access).
Bug fixes and code improvements.
Support iOS 12
Add support for sideloading
Add OLED mode
- Improvements
- Stability improvements.
-Fixes and added an option to show playback speed controls.

- Fixes iPad layout issues.
- Fixes some crashes.
- Fixes login issues (Thanks PoomSmart & Julioverne).
- Code maintenance.

- Rewrote the preference handling portion of the tweak.
- Support for YTMusic 5.21+.
- Bug fixes.
- Fixes login issues on YT Music versions above 5.20, thanks @Peaceful_0
- Properly fix login issues
- Add localisation support.
- Added arabic localisations

- Vietnamese translations (Thanks qnblackcat).
- Added some CarPlay patches.

- Properly removed the premium button from the tab bar which fixes the squished appearance.
- YTMusic v5.26 support.
- Fix
- Added an option that enables text selection for lyrics.
- Localisation fixes.

- Stability improvements and bug fixes.
- Arabic localisation updates.

- YTMusic v5.27 support.
- Major OLED Dark mode improvements.
- Japanese localisations.

- Improvements to the ad removal code.
- Code cleanup.
- Remove some unneeded stuff.

- Added an option to lower the contrast of text & buttons throughout the app.
- Re-designed the settings page.
- Code improvements and cleanup.
- Added additional bundleID check patches.
- Bug fixes.
fix

- Added an option to show a volume bar.
- Fixed audio playback always switching to video mode by default.
- Removed un-needed hooks.
- Added some additional patches.
- Updated localisations.
- Updated patches, bug fixes.
